show_name: Shin no Nakama ja Nai to Yuusha no Party wo Oidasareta node, Henkyou de Slow Life suru Koto ni Shima
other_title: Banished from the Hero's Party, I Decided to Live a Quiet Life in the Countryside
I Was Kicked out of the Hero's Party Because I Wasn't a True Companion so I Decided to Have a Slow Life at the Frontier
真の仲間じゃないと勇者のパーティーを追い出されたので、辺境でスローライフすることにしました
